name: Aging Room - Core Maduro - Major
additionalNotes: The Aging Room Core Maduro cigar is a complex and balanced smoke that features a dark & delicious San Andres wrapper surrounding a premium blend of Dominican binder and filler tobaccos. These medium to full-bodied gems delivers rich notes of earth, cocoa, cream, peppery spice while being creamy and well balanced. The cigars are blended by Rafael Nodal and Jochy Blanco of Tabacalera La Palma in Tamboril, Dominican Republic.
